channel.title: CVE Feed for Microsoft -- PowerShell Core
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Microsoft -- PowerShell Core

item.title: CVE-2019-1167|2024-08-04T18:06:31.690Z -- microsoft -- powershell%20core
item.description: A security feature bypass vulnerability exists in Windows Defender Application Control (WDAC) which could allow an attacker to bypass WDAC enforcement, aka 'Windows Defender Application Control Security Feature Bypass Vulnerability'.
